message:
Ctg'r raj poth theke bolchhi.
Ei matro Esha'r namazer bishal jamat shesh holo. Bishsho Mosjider ashe-pash Biplobi amej. Eid eid vab. Utshaho & anondo khub beshi. Jeno Tahrir squer. Jibon dite sobai prostut.
Ekhane hazar hazar manush slogan dichche r jikir korchhe. Jamiotul falah'r 2 pasha & G.E.C mor porjonto tawhidi jonotar dokhole. Kichu dure Police-ra paper bichhie shuye shuye rest nichche (ha ha...). Sobai dua koiren, jeno Ctg theke Biplob-er shuchona hoi.
Allaaahu Akbar!!!
